text: Man About Town is a 1939 American musical comedy movie directed by Mark Sandrich and starring Jack Benny, Dorothy Lamour, Edward Arnold, Binnie Barnes, Monty Woolley, Isabel Jeans, Phil Harris, Betty Grable, E. E. Clive. It was distributed by Paramount Pictures. == Other websites == * * * Category:1939 musical movies Category:1939 comedy movies Category:American musical comedy movies Category:Paramount Pictures movies Category:Movies directed by Mark Sandrich
title: Man About Town (1939 movie)
